price: 69. We (Allâh) said: "O fire! Be you coolness and safety for Ibrâhîm (Abraham)!"
arabic: قُلۡنَا يَٰنَارُ كُونِي بَرۡدٗا وَسَلَٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: qul'nā yānāru kūnī bardan wasalāman ʿalā ib'rāhīma
